content:
@Eric Trinh (Genesis)
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/253316-Vital-Records.20Birth.20.26.20Fetal.20Death/topic/IG.20Fixes/near/209428476

Moving this here.

You can ignore those SNOMED errors for now. It has something to do with referencing the US Version of SNOMED. I thought it was fixed in the IG, but clearly it keeps popping up again. I'll try to fix it before tomorrow, but if I can't you can ignore.
